title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of Checkboxes Should Use Busy Cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects, the checkboxes do not use a busy cursor during the update process.
EB: The checkboxes should display a busy cursor while updating during the Zip file export process in a workspace with multiple projects.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Initiate the export Zip process.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose file types and press OK.
